pkgmetadata.longdescription: ======README======This is a Python implementation of the Piwik tracking and analytics APIs.Full Documentation at http://piwikapi.readthedocs.org/en/latest/index.html... image:: https://api.travis-ci.org/piwik/piwik-python-api.png :target: https://travis-ci.org/piwik/piwik-python-api
